space.world.Character

    Package Description
    space.world  

    • Uses of Character in space.world

      Subclasses of Character in space.world 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Player
      Represents a player in the game
      Methods in space.world with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void World.dropEntity(Character character, Entity entity, Vector2D dropSpot)
      Lets the character drop the entity, provided that: the character is dropping it in the room the character is in it is dropping it within reach character is actually has the entity in their inventory
      boolean BeamShooter.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Entity.interact(Character c, World w)
      Lets the Character interact with the entity.
      boolean Wallet.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Key.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Button.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Container.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Door.interact(Character c, World w) 
      boolean Teleporter.interact(Character c, World world) 
      void World.moveCharacter(Character c, Vector2D newPos)
      Moves character to the new position but only if: character moves to a vacant spot in the room it's currently in moves to an adjacent room through an open door & the spot it is moving to is vacant
      boolean Container.openClose(Character c)
      Opens or closes the container.
      void World.pickUpEntity(Character character, Entity entity)
      Puts the entity in the character's inventory if it is within reach of the character & is pickup-able
      void World.putInContainer(Character character, Container cont, Entity entity)
      Lets the character to put something from their inventory into a container
      void World.removeFromContainer(Character character, Container cont, Entity entity)
      Lets the character add the entity which is inside the container into their inventory
      boolean Wallet.rummage(Character c)
      Opens or closes the wallet.
      void Container.unlock(Character c)
      Unlocks the container if it is locked & the player unlocking it has the key
      void Door.unlock(Character c)
      Unlocks this if the player has the key to unlock it
